update

public void update()
This method update the model (NewProjectData) with the screen values : The project name If the project is located in the default workspace If sources and build files are separated

text1KeyPressed

protected void text1KeyPressed(org.eclipse.swt.events.KeyEvent evt)
When a key was released in text1 area, if text1 is empty this page is considered not complete else the page is considered complete. That is to say the button next is available
